snippet: Some states have attracted an array of insurers for their exchanges, while options in other states may be limited.
abstract: Range of insurance options will vary significantly from state to state when new exchanges are established under Pres Obama's health care law; states like California, Colorado and Maryland have attracted wide array of insurers, while less populated states like Maine will offer consumers narrow choice between established Blue Cross plan and a small number of start-ups that have no track record.
lead_paragraph: Some states have attracted an array of insurers for their exchanges, while options in other states may be limited.

headline.main: Choice of Health Plans to Vary Sharply From State to State
headline.print_headline: Health Options To Vary Widely State by State

keywords.value: Patient Protection and Affordable Care Act (2010)
keywords.name: subject
